Amplify Popovers & Tooltips

Popovers

<div id="popover-demo">

    <button type='button' class='btn btn-secondary btn-popover' data-container='body' data-toggle='popover' data-placement='right' data-html='true' title="Helpful Message" data-content="Here's lots of helpful information for you" data-template='<div class="popover error-popover" role="tooltip"><div class="arrow"></div><h3 class="popover-header"></h3><div class="popover-body"></div></div>'>
        Error Popover
    </button>


    <div class="add-circle badge-popover" tabindex=0 data-container="body" data-toggle="popover" data-placement="bottom" data-html="true" data-content="Vivamus sagittis lacus vel augue laoreet rutrum faucibus." data-template="<div class='popover wide badge-popover' role='tooltip'><div class='arrow'></div><div class='badge'></div><div class='badge'></div><div class='badge'></div><div class='badge'></div><div class='badge'></div></div>">
        <i class="icon-amplify-add"></i>
    </div>
</div>


<script>
    $(document).ready(function() {

        var target = $('#popover-demo');

        $('[data-toggle="popover"]').popover({
            container: target
        });

        /*$('.badge-popover').popover({
            container: 'body'
        });*/

    });
</script>

Input Popovers

<div id="input-popover-demo">
    <input type="text" class='input-popover' data-container='body' data-toggle='popover' data-placement='right' data-html='true' title="<i class='icon-amplify-caution'></i> Error Message" data-content="Form requirements:<ul><li>Requirement text goes here.</li><li>Here is a clear explanation. It drops to the next line when it is too long</li></ul>"
    data-template='<div class="popover error-popover" role="tooltip"><div class="arrow"></div><h3 class="popover-header"></h3><div class="popover-body"></div></div>' />
</div>

<script>
    $(document).ready(function() {
        var wrapper = $("#popover-demo");

        $('.input-popover').popover({
            container: wrapper
        });
    });
</script>

Tooltip

<div id="tooltip-demo">

    <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Tooltip on top">
        Regular Tooltip
    </button>

    <!-- <div class="pop-container">
        <button type='button' class='btn btn-secondary tooltip-link' data-container='body' data-toggle='popover' data-placement='top' data-html='true' title="Helpful Message" data-content="Here's lots of helpful information for you so <a href=''>click here</a>" data-template='<div class="popover error-popover" role="tooltip"><div class="arrow"></div><h3 class="popover-header"></h3><div class="popover-body"></div></div>' data-trigger="manual">
         Tooltip with Link
        </button>    
    </div>. -->

    <button type='button' class='btn btn-secondary custom-popover'>
        Custom Popover
    </button>

</div>

<script>
    var wrapper = $('#tooltip-demo');

    $(function() {
        $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip({
            container: wrapper
        })
    })

    $('[data-toggle="popover"]').popover({
        container: wrapper
    });

    $('.tooltip-link').hover(function() {
        $(this).popover('show');
    });

    /*$('.pop-container').mouseleave(function(){
        console.log('mouseleave');

        $('.tooltip-link').popover('hide');
    });*/

    var originalLeave = $.fn.popover.Constructor.prototype.leave;
    $.fn.popover.Constructor.prototype.leave = function(obj) {
        var self = obj instanceof this.constructor ?
            obj : $(obj.currentTarget)[this.type](this.getDelegateOptions()).data('bs.' + this.type)
        var container, timeout;

        originalLeave.call(this, obj);

        if (obj.currentTarget) {
            container = $(obj.currentTarget).siblings('.popover')
            timeout = self.timeout;
            container.one('mouseenter', function() {
                //We entered the actual popover – call off the dogs
                clearTimeout(timeout);
                //Let's monitor popover content instead
                container.one('mouseleave', function() {
                    $.fn.popover.Constructor.prototype.leave.call(self, self);
                });
            })
        }
    };


    $('body').popover({
        selector: '[data-popover]',
        trigger: 'click hover',
        placement: 'auto',
        delay: {
            show: 50,
            hide: 400
        }
    });
</script>
